jam.sort.stream
Class BufferStatus

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jam.sort.stream.BufferStatus
public class BufferStatus
extends java.lang.Object

Container for the state of the the FIFO buffer in YaleCAEN_InputStream.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dale Visser

Field Summary
static BufferStatus FIFO_ENDRUN_FLUSH
           
static BufferStatus FIFO_FILLING
          State for when buffer is still filling and no output is available yet.
static BufferStatus FIFO_FLUSH
          This is the state when the EventStream has characters in it indicating that acquisition has been stopped or ended.
static BufferStatus FIFO_FULL
          In this state every new read from the stream requires that the oldest event in the the "FIFO" buffer be pulled to be returned so as to make room for a new event counter.
static BufferStatus PADDING
           
static BufferStatus SCALER

Field Detail

FIFO_FILLING

public static final BufferStatus FIFO_FILLING
State for when buffer is still filling and no output is available yet.

FIFO_FULL

public static final BufferStatus FIFO_FULL
In this state every new read from the stream requires that the oldest event in the the "FIFO" buffer be pulled to be returned so as to make room for a new event counter.

FIFO_FLUSH

public static final BufferStatus FIFO_FLUSH
This is the state when the EventStream has characters in it indicating that acquisition has been stopped or ended. In this situation, all data has been read out from the ADC's and been sent to Jam. So the stream needs to empty out it's remaining contents to the sort routine.

FIFO_ENDRUN_FLUSH

public static final BufferStatus FIFO_ENDRUN_FLUSH

SCALER

public static final BufferStatus SCALER

PADDING

public static final BufferStatus PADDING
